'''Alpha v1.0.13_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 29, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:874885533|1.0.13_01 fixes a few crash bugs]] – The Word of Notch, July 29, 2010</ref> to fix a crash in [[Alpha v1.0.13]].

Alpha v1.0.13_01 was reuploaded to change the logo to "1K IN 24h" to celebrate 1000 sales in the last 24 hours.<ref>[[wordofnotch:875499109|I’m going all gaga now, 1000 sales in 24 hours!]] – The Word of Notch, July 29, 2010</ref><ref>[https://web.archive.org/web/20230424051318/https://imgur.com/HVRgh 1K IN 24h title screenshot uploaded to Imgur on July 29, 2010]</ref><ref>{{ytl| TAZt4Mdpn74|Chronicles of Minecraft: Preview|ChazDragoon|July 29, 2010}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a crash that could occur near certain [[chunk]]s.</onlyinclude>

== ''1K IN 24h'' edition ==
'''[[Title screen]]'''
* Changed ''Minecraft'' logo from [[File:Java Edition logo 2.png|x20px]] to [[File:Java Edition logo 3.png|x20px]].
